articles.title: NHS lung cancer patients to get Sotorasib, a revolutionary drug that stops tumours growing - The Times
articles.description: NHS lung cancer patients will become the first in Europe to receive a revolutionary drug.Sotorasib has been shown in clinical trials to stop tumours in the lung
articles.content:
NHS lung cancer patients will become the first in Europe to receive a revolutionary drug.
Sotorasib has been shown in clinical trials to stop tumours in the lung growing for seven months. It targets… [+517 chars]

articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: ASX set to rise after worst day in seven months as investors took flight over COVID-19 fears - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian share market is expected to rise on opening today after a shock plunge yesterday; US new job claims fall to a pandemic low and the European Central Bank winds back stimulus but denies it is tapering bond purchases.
articles.content:
Australian shares are set to rise on opening today after the worst one-day decline yesterday in seven months as investors fret about the economic havoc caused by COVID-19's Delta variant.

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: 'Mu' Covid variant potentially of concern, EU agency says - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency said Thursday a coronavirus variant known as "Mu" could be cause for concern, although there is no data yet to show it will overtake the dominant Delta strain.
articles.content:
